bio:
With a passionate and outgoing approach, I combine extensive experience analyzing large data sets and transforming complex information streams into actionable insights for key stakeholders. I bring a unique data-driven perspective focused on continuous optimization to drive successful outcomes for cross-functional teams in high-pressure environments.

I live in the beautiful Northwoods of Wisconsin with my husband and daughter. In my spare time I enjoy exploring the local food scene and traveling internationally. Please feel free to review my credentials and portfolio. I look forward to hearing about your challenges, and working together to drive the success of your next project!

certifications.title: Freelance WebApp Designer
certifications.description: In my free time, I work on various side projects combining my interest in software engineering and world history. During the COVID-19 pandemic, I designed, built, and deployed a Spring Boot Java web application as a concept plan for the former UW Madison Lubar Institute for the Study of the Abrahamic Religions. This site displays information about important figures and commemorations in various traditions through the ancient and medieval world, and showcases my coding approach and attention to detail.
